resources.string: Dont Have a CinemaVille Account yet?
Nanti Kita Cerita Tentang Hari Ini

In Sherina Adventure 2, journalist Sherina mission to report on environmental issues leads her to a reunion with old friend Sadam. Together, they rescue a stolen orangutan, rekindling their friendship.

"Air Mata di Ujung Sajadah" is one of the latest Indonesian films that carries the theme of family drama. Directed by Key Mangunsong, the film tells the story of a mother who longs for her child to return after being raised by adoptive parents.

Starting with the story of a wealthy 60-year-old entrepreneur, Ray (Arifin Putra), on his deathbed, questioning lifes purpose. A mysterious man guides him through lifes pivotal moments, addressing fundamental questions.

Angkasa, Aurora, and Awan are siblings in what appears to be a happy family. After Awan significant failure, she meets Kale, an eccentric guy who introduces her to new life experiences. Awan changed behavior creates tension with their parents.
